org.jboss.windup.rules.files.condition.regex

Class StreamRegexMatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.rwitzel.streamflyer.regex.RegexModifier
      • org.jboss.windup.rules.files.condition.regex.StreamRegexMatcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.github.rwitzel.streamflyer.core.Modifier

    public class StreamRegexMatcher
extends com.github.rwitzel.streamflyer.regex.RegexModifier
    Extends RegexModifier to support tracking the line number and column, and to fire StreamRegexMatchedEvent events when content is matched by the regular expression.
    Author:
    Jesse Sightler
